value.title: 2025.43: The Cost of Resiliency
value.content: The best Stratechery content from the week of October 20, 2025, including the cost of resiliency, F1 makes it official with Apple, and a new era for NBA broadcasting.

value.title: Netflix Earnings, KPop Demon Hunters and Netflix Hit Production
value.content: Netflix's growth will depend on advertising; then, more evidence that Netflix was uniquely responsible for KPop Demon Hunters' success.

value.title: Resiliency and Scale
value.content: Decreasing transportation and communications costs increases resiliency in theory, but destroys it in practice. The only way to have resiliency is through less efficiency.

value.title: F1 on Apple TV, Distribution as Differentiation, A Worthwhile Gamble
value.content: F1 is officially on Apple TV, and it's both a worthwhile gamble on Apple's distribution being a differentiator.
